mapper.select: select * from QUESTION order by QUESTION_NUM desc
mapper.insert: insert into QUESTION (QUESTION_NUM, QUESTION_TITLE, QUESTION_CONTENT) values ((select NVL(MAX(QUESTION_NUM)+1, 1)from QUESTION), #{QUESTION_TITLE},#{QUESTION_CONTENT})
mapper.update: update QUESTION set QUESTION_NUM=?, QUESTION_TITLE=?, QUESTION_CONTENT=? where QUESTION_NUM=?
